sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './signcard.css'; import Validate from './ValidateInfo'; const Signup = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [date, setDate] = useState('') const [month, setMonth] = useState('') const [year, setYear] = useState('') const [gender, setGender] = useState('') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [pin, setPin] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [aadhar, setAadhar] = useState('') useEffect( () => { fetch('/signup').then( response => response.json().then(data => {console.log(data)}) ) } ) const submitForm = e => { console.log("Current state is : " + JSON.stringify({name, date, month, year, phone, pin, email, aadhar})) if(!(errors.name || errors.phone || errors.email || errors.aadhar || errors.pin)) { setName('') setDate('') setMonth('') setYear('') setGender('') setPhone('') setPin('') setEmail('') setAadhar('') alert("Form successfully submitted.") } //e.preventDefualt() } const values = { name: name, date : date, month: month, year: year, gender: gender, phone: phone, pin: pin, email: email, aadhar: aadhar, } const errors = Validate(values) var dates = []; for (let i = 1; i <= 31; i++) { dates.push(i) } const dateList = dates.map((x) => {return()}); var years = []; for (let i = 1930; i <= 2020; i++) { years.push(i) } const yearList = years.map((x) => {return()}); return( <>
Create a new account
setName(e.target.value) } value={name}/> Please enter your full name as per Aadhar { errors.name && {errors.name} }
Please enter your date of birth as per Aadhar
+91
setPhone(e.target.value) } value={phone}/>
We will use this mobile for future communications { errors.phone && {errors.phone} }
setPin(e.target.value) } value={pin}/> 6 digit PIN provides extra security to your account with two factor authentication { errors.pin && {errors.pin} }
setEmail(e.target.value) } value={email}/> We will use this Email for future communications { errors.email && {errors.email} }
setAadhar(e.target.value) } value={aadhar}/> {/*
*/}
Digilocker uses Aadhar to verify identity of the user and also to enable authentic document access { errors.aadhar && {errors.aadhar} }
{/*Sign up*/}

Already have an account? Sign In

); } export default Signup;
